definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: The price fixed by the clearing house at which deliveries on futures are invoiced.
sentences.chinese: 由結算所確定的期貨商品交割的票面價格。

sentences.english: For securities firms to fulfill settlement obligations on securities trading markets.
sentences.chinese: 供證券商爲履行證券交易市場之交割義務。

sentences.english: Actuals available for delivery are traded for cash on a spot or forward basis.
sentences.chinese: 可供交割的現貨可在即期或遠期基礎上換成現金。

sentences.english: Both parties of a futures contract must fulfill the contract on the settlement date.
sentences.chinese: 在交割日，買賣雙方都要履行責任。

sentences.english: When it comes to physical delivery, the method of payment is irrelevant.
sentences.chinese: 當涉及到實物交割的時候，支付方式則是不相關的。

sentences.english: You cannot simply take delivery of cocoa and make the price double.
sentences.chinese: 你沒法通過交割讓可可價格翻上一番。

sentences.english: The Flemings replied to advise that they would not be proceeding given that they had not sold their own property.
sentences.chinese: 復萊明回覆，稱不能交割因爲自己的房子還沒有賣出。

sentences.english: WHEREAS, upon the completion of the restructuring steps set forth in the Restructuring Plan and prior to Closing.
sentences.chinese: 鑑於在重組方案所列的重組步驟完成時及在交割以前。

sentences.english: In the stock-exchange deals he had been as quick as a flash at times.
sentences.chinese: 他有時候像閃電般地交割證券交易所的買賣。

sentences.english: Thirdly, carry out shipping delivery to mostly play down the cost.
sentences.chinese: 三是實行船板交割方式，最大限度地降低交割成本。

sentences.english: Thirdly, carry out shipping delivery to mostly play down the cost.
sentences.chinese: 三是實行船板交割方式，最大限度地降低交割成本。

sentences.english: Non- deliverable contracts are settled in dollars.
sentences.chinese: 不可交割合約以美元結算。

sentences.english: The future date is called the delivery date or final settlement date.
sentences.chinese: 未來的日期也叫交割日或到期日。

sentences.english: Non-deliverable contracts are settled in dollars.
sentences.chinese: 無本金交割合同中的結算貨幣是美元。

sentences.english: It is simply your Continuation Day.
However it expressly does not prevent delivery of convertible or zero-coupon bonds.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它並未明確排除可轉換交割或零息債券。

definition: to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
merchandise or commodities available immediately after sale/merchandise in stock/available item/actuals (investment)/actual commodities
to settle a bill/to close an account
to settle accounts/to clear accounts/to liquidate/to expose and criticize
